title: Rule Omega: Greenhall, Schmachtenberger, Wheal (clip)
description:
Is there one simple hack that would help us make sense of the world and have genuine conversations around new and difficult topics?

Jordan Greenhall and Daniel Schmachtenberger explain to Jamie Wheal how "Rule Omega" works in practice.

This is a clip from our exclusive discussion between these three thinkers, available exclusively to subscribers: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
